sentences.en: A toddler requires close supervision and firm control at all times.
sentences.cn: 刚学步的孩子时刻需要寸步不离的照看，并要牢牢看紧。

sentences.en: A toddler who was a menace in a shop full of crystal.
sentences.cn: 对放满水晶制品的商店构成威胁的蹒跚学步的孩子.

sentences.en: a toddler's first few halting steps
For the toddler and older child, simply hand them the cup.
sentences.cn: 可以让正在学步的小孩和较大的儿童自己拿杯子喝药.

sentences.en: I had a toddler at home and two other children at school.
sentences.cn: 我有一个刚学步的孩子在家中，另外两个孩子在学校。

sentences.en: If the toddler had been dealt with properly at first, the rest of his misbehaviour would have been avoided.
sentences.cn: 要是从一开始就对小孩子合理管教，他就不会养成其他的坏毛病。

sentences.en: Monica: A toddler is he? They can be difficult at times.
sentences.cn: 莫妮卡: 学走路啦? 这个时期的孩子,有时很难应付.

sentences.en: The toddler pointed to the toy he wanted.
sentences.cn: 蹒跚学步的孩子指着想要的玩具.

sentences.en: The toddler suddenly stretched his hands behind their chairs, laughing and jumping about.
sentences.cn: 那小孩子忽然向她们背后伸了双手, 大笑大跳.

sentences.en: The toddler took a few tentative steps forward, and fell.
sentences.cn: 那刚学走路的孩子走了没几步试探性的脚步, 就跌倒了.

sentences.en: The toddler tried to walk but kept falling down.
sentences.cn: 那小孩学着走路但老是跌跤.

sentences.en: The toddler was a real wiggler on plane trips.
sentences.cn: 学步的小孩在飞机上走不稳.

sentences.en: There are toddler - friendly versions of the most famous Bible stories.
sentences.cn: 还有最著名的《圣经》故事的“儿童友好(toddler-friendly)”装.

sentences.en: Timmy, now a toddler, splashed in the surf with his grandfather.
sentences.cn: 此时的蒂米已经开始学步,同他的外祖父一道在海边的浪花里戏水嬉闹.

sentences.en: Use age - appropriate ( toddler ) educational toys and books to teach me.
sentences.cn: 用 学龄 前的教育玩具和书来教我.

sentences.en: Who can fold up a pushchair, toddler and shopping and then get them all onto the bus?
sentences.cn: 谁有那本事一手收起婴儿推车，一手抱着刚会走路的孩子，还得提着刚买的东西，然后挤上公共汽车？
